text_block_list.text: One day after school, Matikanetannhauser happily came up to talk.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I've decided to go back to my parents' house during the next break.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It happens every time, but when I go home, a celebration party starts at my family's teishoku restaurant!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The heaping mixed fry set my dad and mom make... That moment when I stuff my face with it...♪
choice_data_list: Be careful not to eat too much.
Go ahead and eat a lot.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The heaping mixed fry set my dad and mom make... That moment when I stuff my face with it...♪
choice_data_list: Be careful not to eat too much.
Go ahead and eat a lot.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? You had to point that out!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I guess that's right... I'm a proper athlete now, I can't just eat without thinking ahead...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I understand, I'll contact my parents in advance and warn them not to make too much.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I wonder if horse mackerel fry would be okay...
And so, Matikanetannhauser's overeating was prevented.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'll savor the taste of home for the first time in a while!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wait for me, plump shrimp fry! Juicy tonkatsu!
And so, Matikanetannhauser ended up getting plenty of nutrition during her visit home.
